scripts.dev:site:fr: SITE=pix-site SITE_DOMAIN=FR PORT=6001 DOMAIN_FR=http://localhost:6001 DOMAIN_ORG=http://localhost:7000 nuxt dev
scripts.dev:site:org: SITE=pix-site SITE_DOMAIN=ORG PORT=7000 DOMAIN_FR=http://localhost:6001 DOMAIN_ORG=http://localhost:7000 nuxt dev
scripts.dev:host:site:fr: SITE=pix-site SITE_DOMAIN=FR PORT=6001 DOMAIN_FR=http://localhost:6001 DOMAIN_ORG=http://localhost:7000 nuxt dev --host
scripts.dev:host:site:org: SITE=pix-site SITE_DOMAIN=ORG PORT=7000 DOMAIN_FR=http://localhost:6001 DOMAIN_ORG=http://localhost:7000 nuxt dev --host
scripts.generate: rm -rf ./build && mkdir build && npm run generate-fr && npm run generate-org
scripts.start:nginx: PORT=80 erb pix-site/servers.conf.erb > nginx.conf && docker-compose up
